sqlMap.statement: insert into kline_1_min (ts,symbol,`count`,amount,`open`,`close`,low,vol) values (#id#,#symbol#,#count#,#amount#,#open#,#close#,#low#,#vol#) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `count`=`count`,amount=amount,`open`=`open`,`close`=`close`,low=low,vol=vol
